item.description:
Let's go check out Keon's brunch.


Keon's at The Black Swan Country Club in Georgetown, MA is serving up the area's finest cuisine in a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere. With our two restaurants, Keon's Grille and Keon's Fine Dining we are sure to satisfy both the casual and decorous meal.

Some of the selections on their brunch menu is:
Assorted pastries, muffins breads and rolls,
Fresh fruit, granola and yogurt,
Aged Vermont cheddar scrambled eggs,
Omelet station with ALL the fixings.
Home fries bacon and sausage,
French toast,
Panko crusted Haddock,
Chef's choice race or potato
Carving station
*Build Your Own Bloody Mary Table*
and much much more

Pricing:
Adults: $19.95 (alcohol not included)

So come on out join us at a new place to check out brunch, meet some new people and have some laugh's.

If we get a big enough response for this we will call and see if they can reserve us a few tables.

Parking:
They have a very big parking lot.

Bad weather will cancel this event remember to check back to confirm that this is still on. If you are not able to find us get lost or running late remember to take the Meetup phone # with you it is: 978-304-2811.

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event. If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”.

Remember to change your RSVP if your plans change. Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the room where the brunch is.
item.name: Let's go to brunch.
